// components/Audience.js import React from 'react'; const Audience = () => { return (

Designed For Everyone

Tailored experiences for different legal needs

Advocates

Private workspace, case management, alternative arguments, e-filing, and client updates.

Law Students

Dissertation help, moot court preparation, exam prep, and career guidance.

Legal Clerks

Daily hearing calendars, SMS alerts, and fake case monitoring.

Parties

Case-based subscriptions with applied research and guidance.

Researchers

Dedicated doctrinal research tools and analysis frameworks.

General Public

Free legal queries, micropayments for extras, and easy-to-use templates.

); }; export default Audience;
